column4: when i open my webbrowsers, it says mozplugger cant find mozpluggerrc when i have it at /etc/mozpluggerrc
where else would it look for mozpluggerrc?
ive got a copy of it in all those places and all browsers using mozplugger still say MozPlugger: Warning: Unable to find the mozpluggerrc file.
im using not the original mozpluggerrc tho...is there a way for it to completely re-install mozplugger?
well. I don't haven't used mozplugger for > year.  Let me dink with it a minute
ive tried dpkg-reconfigure but its not replacing all of its files
do you have a file you are trying to play? where are you seeing this error?
when i open opera or firefox
the plugins from it arent working either
in firefox do:: about:plugins  do you see mozplugger?
